title: Becoming
description: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States

title: Beloved
description: Beloved begins in 1873 in Cincinnati, Ohio, where Sethe has been living with her eighteen-year-old daughter

title: American Grown
description: The book promotes healthy eating and documents the White House Kitchen Garden through the seasons

title: The Bluest Eye
description: The novel takes place in Lorain, Ohio, and tells the story of a young African-American girl named Pecola who grew up following the Great Depression
